abstract: David Sokol will succeed Richard Santulli as chairman and interim C.E.O. of NetJets, the Berkshire Hathaway unit that sells fractional ownership in corporate jets, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: David Sokol will succeed Richard Santulli as chairman and interim C.E.O. of NetJets, the Berkshire Hathaway unit that sells fractional ownership in corporate jets, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Richard Santulli will step down as chairman and chief executive of NetJets, an aviation company that is a unit of Berkshire Hathaway. David Sokol will succeed Mr. Santulli as chairman and interim C.E.O. of the company, which sells fractional ownership in corporate jets, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: At Berkshire’s Jets Unit, Sokol Said to Replace Santulli
